entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 08:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain at times mixed with light wet snow beginning this evening except wet snow over higher terrain. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with light wet snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wet snow over higher terrain early in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
